api_list.api_description: Submit a data request for earthquake details.

optional_parameters.name: starttime
optional_parameters.description: Limit events on or after the specified start time.

optional_parameters.name: endtime
optional_parameters.description: Limit the events on or before the specified end time.

optional_parameters.name: minmagnitude
optional_parameters.description: Limit to events with a magnitude larger than the specified minimum.

optional_parameters.name: maxmagnitude
optional_parameters.description: Limit to events with a magnitude smaller than the specified maximum.

query: Tell me today's cat fact and provide the earthquake data for events between January 1, 2023, and January 2, 2023, with a magnitude range between 5 and 7 in the geojson format.
